name: Northern Harvest Buck
preparation:
This take on the Whiskey Ginger (a.k.a the Irish Buck) adds a squeeze of lime and some bitters, which complement the slightly spicy but smooth Crown Royal Northern Harvest rye.

Add the rye and lime juice into a shaker with ice and shake well.

Strain into a highball glass over fresh ice.

Add the bitters, and top with the ginger beer.

Garnish with a lemon wheel and mint sprig.
